Meet the Guys

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16.0″ _module_preset=”default” header_2_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_2_font_size=”45px” header_2_line_height=”1.3em” custom_margin=”||14px|||” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Meet The Team

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16.0″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” text_line_height=”1.8em” header_text_color=”#FFFFFF” global_colors_info=”{}”]

From the beginning, what has made 4Space Mining what it is today is the great group of people behind it. Our team is highly trained and all have a love for what we are here for today cryptocurrency. From miners to investors, to people persons we have everything to guide you in the right direction.  Being a group of great friends, we are not only working hard but also having a lot of fun doing it. Meet the team below by checking out their bios and listening to their favorite Spotify Playlists.

Dan Borovic – Co-founder, Director of Sales & Consulting  

Danilo co-founded 4Space Mining in 2020. Danilo’s primary focus in the company is on consulting and helping to educate people on mining, how it works, and it’s present and future role in this wildly disruptive and revolutionary technological space known as crypto. When outside of the 4Space office Danilo enjoys running other businesses as well as training and competing in the professional JiuJitsu circuit. Danilo has trained, coached, and helped corner multiple UFC fighters and continues to be involved in the combat sports arena to this day.

Edwin Edwin Martinez – Co-Founder & Director of Operations and Consulting 

Edwin co-founded 4Space Mining in 2020 along with Dan & Tony and has since loved being able to help manage daily operations and keep things running smoothly. Outside of 4Space Edwin owns and operates a video production company named Untitled Art Media where he film’s awesome ads and commercials for businesses. When he’s not working, he loves spending time with family, getting together with friends and traveling to new places.

Tony Montemurro – Co-founder, Director of Communications and Consulting 

Tony co-founded 4Space Mining in 2020 with his friends Edwin and Dan. The trio have grown the business substantially over the last year, with branching into building rigs, mining, hosting and investing for clients. When not in the world of Crypto, Tony enjoys spending time with his wife, Kristen, and his sons, TJ, Dale, and Frankie. Tony is currently employed as a Podiatrist at Froedtert South Hospital in Kenosha, Wisconsin.

Dragan Terzic – Online Sales Representative

Dragan – Dragan joined 4Space Mining in 2021 as an in-house CPA and Crypto accountant. Dragan has also taken on the role of sales & consulting. Dragan entered the space of cryptocurrency back in 2017 and has since been very passionate about it. When Dragan’s not working he enjoys alpine skiing, traveling, and spending time with friends & family.

Jelena Sever – Project Manager 

Jelena joined the team in 2020. She has loved managing and engaging in hands on operations. From buildings rigs, to trouble shooting to handing shipping and delivery, she’s done it all! When she’s not working at 4Space Jelena enjoys the outdoors, playing soccer, staying diligent in school at the University of Milwaukee, and spending time with her family.

Jandrija Sever – Director of Media and Advertising 

Jandrija was brought on board 4Space Mining in 2020 and has since loved being able to capture content and tell stories of the building of 4Space Mining. Outside of 4Space Jandrija Co-owns and operates a video production company named Untitled Art Media along with Edwin where he film’s awesome ads and commercials for businesses. When he’s not working, he loves spending time outdoors, getting together with friends and traveling to new destinations.

Kris Vangalis – Graphic Designer & Media Editor

Beginning his journey with 4 Space Mining in late 2021, Kris brings experience from multiple creative fields. Having worked in graphic design, music production, podcasting, fashion design and more, Kris handles media production needs for 4 Space Mining. When not in the office, Kris enjoys creating music, drawing, and doting on his wife and cats.[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ admin_label=”Popup – #mike” module_id=”mike” module_class=”popup dark” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” width=”85%” width_tablet=”85%” width_phone=”85%” width_last_edited=”on|desktop” custom_margin=”0px|0px|0px|0px|true|true” custom_padding=”0px|0px|0px|0px|true|true” da_is_popup=”on” da_popup_slug=”mike” da_dark_close=”on” da_disable_devices=”off|off|off” collapsed=”on” global_colors_info=”{}” da_exit_intent=”off” da_has_close=”on” da_alt_close=”off” da_not_modal=”on” da_is_singular=”off” da_with_loader=”off” da_has_shadow=”on”][et_pb_row column_structure=”2_5,3_5″ use_custom_gutter=”on” gutter_width=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” background_color=”#002a3f” width=”100%” max_width=”100%” custom_margin=”0px|0px|0px|0px|true|true” custom_padding=”0px|0px|0px|0px|true|true” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://fourspacemining.com/wp-content/uploads/Untitled-2-1.jpg” title_text=”Untitled-2-1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”60px|100px|60px|60px|true|false” custom_padding_tablet=”60px|100px|60px|60px|true|false” custom_padding_phone=”30px|30px||30px|false|true” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#FFFFFF” header_2_text_color=”#FFFFFF” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Mike Anderson – Online Sales Representative

Mike joined 4Space mining in 2022 after observing the deep friendships, passion and amazing chemistry shared among all 4Space’s team members. Mike has over 35 years of experience in the Information Technology space – specializing in TCP/IP and Network Engineering. After building and repairing PC’s while still in high school, Mike became the owner of Wisconsin’s first commercial dial-up Internet Service Provider founded in 1989 – servicing Milwaukee’s most prominent companies. Outside of 4Space, Mike enjoys training Jiu-Jitsu and photographing Jiu-Jitsu championships around the USA.

Noah Marchese – Sales Representative

Joined up with 4 Space Mining Team early 2022, Noah has 3 years of sales experience from other various company’s having sold household goods all the way to electronics, Noah prides himself on being personable and professional. When not working Noah enjoys, fishing, gardening, practicing his vocals and finding happiness wherever possible.

Will Sallis – Sales Manager

Will joined 4Space Mining in 2021 as a Sales Representative. Will studied sales and marketing for 4 years at the University of Wisconsin Whitewater. Since Will has joined the team he has learned diligently about cryptocurrency and is motivated to grow the company each day. When Will isn’t working he enjoys weightraining, fishing, and spending time with friends.

Mina Botros – Online Sales Representative

Mina, a life long friend of 4Space Mining cofounders, joined the team in 2022. His attention to detail and in depth analysis of promising upcoming crypto projects is highlighted in his easy to understand crypto lectures. He has over 10 years of lecturing and public speaking experience. Talking at various universities and businesses through out the United States. Mina is a successful practicing holistic Chiropractor, a published author, and runs other health businesses when not involved in crypto.
